mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ld_no AS "ldNo", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.status AS "status", a.alloc_id AS "allocId", a.ld_op AS "ldOp", a.ld_time AS "ldTime", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
mapper.select: SELECT wsh.so_no AS soNo, wsh.so_type AS soType, wsh.logistic_no AS logisticNo, wsh.fm_etd AS fmEtd, wsh.to_etd AS toEtd, wsh.line AS line, wsh.consignee_code AS consigneeCode, wsh.consignee_name AS consigneeName, wsh.consignee_tel AS consigneeTel, wsh.consignee_addr AS consigneeAddr, wsh.carrier_code AS carrierCode, ebcu.ebcu_name_cn AS carrierName, wsh.ld_status AS ldStatus FROM wm_ld_detail wld LEFT JOIN wm_so_alloc wsa ON wld.alloc_id = wsa.alloc_id AND wld.org_id = wsa.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_so_header wsh ON wsa.so_no = wsh.so_no AND wsa.org_id = wsh.org_id LEFT JOIN eb_customer ebcu ON wsh.carrier_code = ebcu.ebcu_customer_no AND wsh.org_id = ebcu.org_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND wld.ld_no = #{ldNo} AND wld.org_id = #{orgId} GROUP BY wsh.so_no, wsh.logistic_no, wsh.so_type, wsh.fm_etd, wsh.to_etd, wsh.line, wsh.consignee_code, wsh.consignee_name, wsh.consignee_tel, wsh.consignee_addr, wsh.carrier_code, ebcu.ebcu_name_cn, wsh.ld_status

SELECT wsa.to_id AS toId, wsa.tracking_no AS trackingNo, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsa.so_no) AS soNo, SUM(wsa.qty_ea) AS wsa_qty_ea, SUM(wsa.qty_ea * IFNULL(cws.gross_weight, 0)) AS wsaGrossWeight, SUM(wsa.qty_ea * IFNULL(cws.net_weight, 0)) AS wsaNetWeight, SUM(wsa.qty_ea * IFNULL(cws.cubic, 0)) AS wsaCubic, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.logistic_no) AS logistic_no, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.consignee_code) as consigneeCode, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.consignee_name) as consigneeName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.consignee_tel) AS consignee_tel, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.consignee_addr) AS consignee_addr, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.contact_name) AS contact_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.contact_tel) AS contact_tel, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT wsh.contact_addr) AS contact_addr FROM wm_ld_detail wld LEFT JOIN wm_so_alloc wsa ON wld.alloc_id = wsa.alloc_id AND wld.org_id = wsa.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_so_header wsh ON wsa.so_no = wsh.so_no AND wsa.org_id = wsh.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_sku cws ON wsa.owner_code = cws.owner_code AND wsa.sku_code = cws.sku_code AND wsa.org_id = cws.org_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND wld.ld_no = #{ldNo} AND wld.org_id = #{orgId} GROUP BY wsa.to_id, wsa.tracking_no

SELECT wsa.alloc_id AS allocId, wsa.wave_no AS waveNo, wsa.so_no AS soNo, wsa.line_no AS lineNo, wsa.owner_code AS ownerCode, wsa.sku_code AS skuCode, wsa.lot_num AS lotNum, wsa.pack_code AS packCode, wsa.uom AS uom, wsa.qty_uom AS qtyUom, wsa.qty_ea AS qtyEa, wsa.to_loc AS toLoc, wsa.to_id AS toId, wsa.check_status AS checkStatus, wsa.status AS status, cws.is_qc AS isQc, cws.is_serial AS isSerial FROM wm_ld_detail wld LEFT JOIN wm_so_alloc wsa ON wld.org_id = wsa.org_id AND wld.alloc_id = wsa.alloc_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_sku cws ON cws.org_id = wsa.org_id AND cws.sku_code = wsa.sku_code AND cws.owner_code = wsa.owner_code WHERE 1 = 1 AND wld.org_id = #{orgId} AND wld.ld_no = #{ldNo}
AND wld.status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_ld_detail( id, ld_no, line_no, status, alloc_id, ld_op, ld_time, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ldNo}, #{lineNo}, #{status}, #{allocId}, #{ldOp}, #{ldTime}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_ld_detail SET ld_no = #{ldNo}, line_no = #{lineNo}, status = #{status}, alloc_id = #{allocId}, ld_op = #{ldOp}, ld_time = #{ldTime}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
